name: The Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer
about: What it is:A light, hydrating moisturizer powered by patented TFC8 thatu2019s clinically shown to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and hyperpigmentation..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- TFC8: Nourishes and protects skin, supporting cellular renewal..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Inspired by 30 years of research, this lightweight yet hydrating cream replenishes skinu2019s moisture and visibly transforms your complexion. Infused with TFC8u2014a patented blend of amino acids, vitamins, and synthesized moleculesu2014the fragrance-free formula delivers key nutrients to encourage more even-, firm-, and toned-looking skin..Clinical Results:In a 28-day user trial with 90 participants:
ingredients: -TFC8: Nourishes and protects skin, supporting cellular renewal. .-Vitamin A (Retinyl Palmitate): Supports improved skin-barrier function and moisture retention..-Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid): A potent antioxidant that visibly brightens skin and supports collagen production...Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Phosphatidylcholine, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Carbomer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Squalane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Lecithin, Cholesterol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ceramide NP, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Superoxide Dismutase, Citric Acid, Dextran, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Ceramide NG, Glycine, Lysine, Oleic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Phenylalanine, Proline, Scenedesmus Rubescens Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dextran Sulfate, Brassica Alba Oil, Disodium EDTA, Oligopeptide-177, Sodium Ascorbate, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean skin, morning and night. .-Massage along your jawline with upward, sweeping motions. .-Sweep from your nose to your ears, across your forehead, and over your cheeks outward to your temples. .-Apply from the base of your neck to the tip of your chin. .-Massage any excess product over your decollete.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product around four or five times I noticed a horrible and irritated rash all over my face. It was red and bumpy and burned. Do not recommend unless you want to pay $300 for a fuming rash.

reviews.review_text: This is truly a top tier brand and not just because of its fancy bottle itu2019s a German brand itu2019s a multi cream with vitamin a,c,e made with u201cstem cellsu201d so the skin can repair itself great for acne and on sensitive skin fragrance free my skin has never been soo clear thank you bader!!!

reviews.review_title: Smell and horrible feeling on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, the smell and texture of this product are just not worth the price tag. I had heard and read many reviews saying it's a good option for oily/combo, and I can't use this cream. Compared to other and much thicker creams I have used in the past (which are marketed for dry skin), this cream doesn't seem to be absorbed by the skin, it just sits on top, and it feels so uncomfortable to have on. I had quite the expectations, especially for the price, but it just didn't work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bad smell? It literally smells like nothing. A tiny amount of this on my face at night has left my sensitive, blemish prone peri-menopausal skin looking radiant!menopause

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combo skin with aging concerns: redness, dullness and hyperpigmentation. Also some pretty consistent dry patches. Unfortunately for me this year, my skin has been the driest Ive experienced in my life! I started reaching through my entire cabinet of skincare and doing double duty - even started going through the samples when I found this. I applied it and found the consistency thin but decidedly underwhelming for my current purposes; I was looking for heavy duty, Aquaphor level stuff, tbh, which is not something Ive ever needed for my face before. I generally like thinner consistencies as I find heavy creams overwhelm my skin, but you likely understand why I found the thinness of this product, in this moment, disappointing, given the context. Surprisingly however -  my skin drank this up really well (along with 3 others moisturizers) and I found visible change in results the very next day. I wasnt sure which product made the most difference so I rotated this with the other moisturizers, and the days I used/didnt use this, there was a noticeable difference. I was able to successfully overcome the extreme dry season, but still find myself reaching for this here and there as my skin just feels really supple and calm when I use this. Thankfully it doesnt take dollops of this to feel a difference. I really dislike the price, but Im going to have to purchase a full size when my sample runs out as its been a huge part of me overcoming and maintaining healthy skin this winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fell in love with this stuff the second I put it on!! I have terribly sensitive, blotchy and dry skin. Dude this stuff is miraculous. No scent that I can pick up on so great for those with sensitivities. A few days into using A Bader products and I have gotten so many compliments on my glowing skin.   I recommend this product without any hesitation whatsoever. Itu2019s expensive but for people with skin like me, itu2019s a godsend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased a trial size from the Sephora beauty bazaar, and after regular use morning and night for 10 days, stopped using. This cream is thin and I prefer a rich cream, but can look past that for a product with results.. however, I could never find a comfortable amount to use. A thin amount left my skin feeling thirsty but a second application would just sit and feel greasy. Felt like a drugstore moisturizer, tbh. I had no idea it was so pricey! If you're on the fence, give it a pass- there are tons of other expensive brands to gamble on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t like the consistency, itu2019s very thin and watery like. Not very moisturizing, in my opinion. It also caused some texture on my cheeks, almost rash like. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the product for 6 months now and have to admit this is probably the best moisturizer I have tried. I was 'blessed' with somewhat sensitive combination skin that's prone to breakouts, however after using the products my skin texture got better with minimal acne flares.

I used my points to get two sample tubes.  I wasnu2019t expecting much out of this based on mixed reviews.  After finishing the tubes, Iu2019m buying a bottle.  Itu2019s painfully expensive but I like it better then La Mer (which for some reason doesnu2019t work for me any more and way too expensive). I noticed  my skin looked clearer, supple (like after a hydrating facial), it absorbed perfectly and made my skin super soft.  I have combo skin and this did not make me greasy in my usually super oily areas.  I also got a few compliments on the texture of my skin after about a weeku2019s of use.   Iu2019d say get a sample and test this out for yourself.  I loved it and I was cynical

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not recommend this cream if you have a dry skin. Not hydrating at all and has a weird smell. Any generic cream wouls hydrate better than this.

reviews.review_title: I was lost but now am found
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this regularly for over a year now and I will never go back. I went through a period of terrible acne in the summer of 2021, and the scarring and dark spots that were left after I was able to get it under control were driving me crazy. I tried so many other treatments at all price points and this is the only product I noticed an actual difference. 12/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try this based on what Iu2019d seen in recent media so I grabbed the small size during the big 20% off anything in Sephora event. I will definitely go back for the large size when Iu2019m out of the small size. I absolutely love the texture. Itu2019s not too heavy nor is it nonexistent. I feel dewy and glowy after using it. I generally use it during the day on clean skin when I plan on going barefaced. I use it all the way up to my lower lash line and forego eye cream. Iu2019ve seen reviews that said that it pills when you apply it over other products. I canu2019t speak to that, but every so often when Iu2019m not barefaced, I apply a tinted sunscreen or Ilia Super Serum Skin Tint and concealer over this moisturizer. These products sit beautifully on top of The Cream. Itu2019s pricey but a little goes a long way. Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use the rich cream and I really love it but this one, the cream, had such a gross smell to it I couldnu2019t keep it. Itu2019s unfortunate because itu2019s lighter weight than the rich cream and looks beautiful on skin and under makeup but I couldnu2019t get past the smell - especially with this price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It wasn't the 'hype' surrounding this product that drew me in, but the ingredients - Retinol, 2 forms of Vitamin C and even 'Ceramide NP', Interestingly none of these are present in the 'rich version' which contains more emollients and less of the beneficial stuff. It's very rare to find two formulations of a product, with the one aimed at oilier and younger skin types turning out to be the better of the two! Anyhow, I used this daily as instructed, followed by SPF until I'd used up the product. It absorbs quickly and has a very light scent to it which reminds me ever so slightly of a bakery with a hint of cocoa powder! Packaging is stunning too. Did I notice better skin? Yes, a slightly brighter, more even and hydrated complexion for sure. But...nothing out of the ordinary. In fact speaking of ordinary I could achieve the same results with an assortment of The Ordinary serums (which I've also tried extensively) and all for about 1/15th of the price of a full size jar of this, and they would last much longer too! This is why I cannot give 'The Cream' 4 or 5 lippies, the price point is just absurd. If I can achieve similar results for less money, why would I pay more?    ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxeu2019 u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_title: dont do it girl its not worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Writing this now that my bottle is empty and I've had several months to see how well it works. I honestly do not think this is worth the price whatsoever. I bit the bullet and bought it during the VIB sale, and even with 20% off I don't feel that it was worth it. It's not bad and it absorbs very quickly, which I liked, but there's no magic here! I did not see any difference in skin tone or aging. I personally have preferred my la roche posay over this AB one. If you can comfortably afford this, try it out, but if it feels like a splurge, I'm telling you it's not worth it...you'll probably get the same or better results with a consistent skincare routine using more affordable products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m currently age 55. At age 46, I went through chemotherapy/ mastectomy for breast cancer and required a hysterectomy. Due to the type of breast cancer I had, I could not use hormone replacement therapy after my hysterectomy because the hormones could feed my cancer. I noticed that I really started to age fast. Iu2019ve always been very diligent about taking care of my skin but the aging really seemed accelerated. The Cream is the only product that has given me that u201cAha Moment.u201d  It is very noticeable for me. Although it is expensive it is a must have for me. Iu2019ve tried them all regardless of price but this one stood out for me. Itu2019s the only one that I wonu2019t do without. No other product compares to the results for me. Iu2019m giving it a 4 star rating only because of the price. But the product itself amazes me and I am not easily impressed. Love this product!

reviews.review_title: My Personal Fave for Texture & Wrinkles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I've read mixed reviews on this product and every product is not for everyone as we have have diff needs/concerns. This is just enough moisture for me along with a good moisture serum and I can get dry but more so combo. For me, it's a must have. I have tried just about every product/brand out there I feel like(close to!) from high end to low. I tend to use higher end skincare and this works for my personal needs. If you want to work on texture , fine lines, firmness, and hyperpigmentation then this is for you. For me personally I cannot use a super greasy moisturizer or it ruins my texture, so for me this is great. If you are looking for just an amazing basic moisturizer because you have extreme dry skin then this is prob not for you. The rich cream is great also and more so suited for those looking for something heavier without the retinol and vit c.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most effective thing about this cream is the marketing, which I fell for once, but won't ever again. Everyone knows there's no miracle cream that will completely transform your skin, but some things help more than others. And there are items genuinely worth the expense--La Mer eye concentrate, a good Lancome mascara--at nearly $1.50 a day (the 1 oz bottle, used as a day cream, lasted four months), this stuff isn't even all that good as just a moisturizer. Won't do it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the hype/price. Thought Iu2019d give AB products a try after all the amazing reviews. Using this along with the face wash and toner for a few months now. Honestly, Iu2019m not impressed and see better results with Sunday Riley, Tata Harper or Drunk Elephant comparable (and significantly cheaper) products. Will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A lot of reviews say is doesnu2019t have a scent, but it does. It actually smells like raw chocolate chip cookie dough. Iu2019m not too comfortable putting something that smells like dessert on my face. Clean scents are better for the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I have tried out cheaper ones and I notice the difference right away. Why must you be so perfect but so expensive? Why must my skin lobe your super expensive cream so much?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey splurge to reduce the crepe look under my eyes. Itu2019s not an under eye cream, however I use it all over my face and neck. When this runs out Iu2019ll have to make a decision whether to reorder this or La Mer. I like that this has a pump so it seems more sanitary, however for the price the other seems to last longer.

reviews.review_title: Good to balance skin when using strong treatments
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cream every morning for a month. I use tretinoin at night and couldnu2019t seem to get rid of the chin peeling (itu2019s been going on 4+ months). Now Iu2019m seeing that tret glow with barely any peeling and the purging seems to have plateaued too. I have adult hormonal acne + melasma and am well versed in proper skincare but I got so tired of trying different hydrating toners, night creams, day creams, soothing serums and tret application routines I finally broke down and bought this and Iu2019m glad I did. Ouch to that price though thus 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: How much is this stuff????? Seriously, save your money. It's a face cream, it moisturizes.....that's about it. I found no more benefit to this than I did to drug store creams. You are paying for a brand, not quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing thing I've ever used on my face. My face looks overall healthier and brightened

reviews.review_title: yes, it actually lives up to all the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: OK so I really did not want to like this product because of how expensive it is and I hate to say it but this product is really worth the price. It lives up to the hype and more. I saw a noticeable difference immediately and plan to continue using and re-purchase again in the future.  I have never been this impressed By a skincare product before in my life and I have tried a lot. Itu2019s not going to change your life but it does a whole lot for something that is just a topical product. I am a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll start by saying that I am always skeptical of expensive face/body products that claim to work miracles.  Thatu2019s said, I tried a sample of this and noticed a difference almost immediately in the texture and tone of my skin.  Not even exaggerating.  I immediately purchased the full size and I havenu2019t looked back.  My skin tone and texture is SO improved.  Dark spots have faded.  Even my acne is almost totally gone (and it doesnu2019t even claim to help acne).  I have had numerous people comment on how great my skin looks since I started using this stuff.  I will never use another face cream again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i regret to inform my bank account that this is, in fact, a miracle product. i got a few gross zits after the first application (that i popped, sorry) but they healed unnaturally fast and i havenu2019t had any since. the blackheads on my chin were gone after ~3 days. my skin is firm and soft after washing, when before it would be dry and tight before applying products. all iu2019m waiting for now is the blackheads on my nose to go away, and if/when they do, iu2019ll be this brands #1 fan. it smells weirdly like the bread aisle at the grocery store, but it fades within minutes. obviously, everyoneu2019s skin is different, but if you can afford this, you should definitely try it.  for transparency, my (once a day) routine is: wash with cetaphil gentle skin cleanser, hot water, and a white washcloth laundered with bleach. pat dry with clean towel. apply SK-II facial treatment essence all over face. apply glossier super pure serum all over face. apply two pumps of augustinus bader the cream all over face. apply one pump of glossier bubble wrap eye cream to under eye area only. i donu2019t stray outside that area or i break out.   hope this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Left skin feeling dry and tacky. Worse than drug store moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a mini sample in my order. Felt nice going on but Iu2019ve used moisturizers that cost way less with these ingredients that moisturize better. I would not splurge for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my face red, right and irritated. Definitely not recommend. Save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m currently using both the regular cream and the rich cream, which I bought with my own coins, and I find both products wonderful. I paired the cream with my usual toners and serums, and they work together beautifully. (Though I do think the cream on its own might be not enough for very dry skins.) I almost feel the regular cream has a slightly tightening effect, because I can seriously see a difference in my face the second day. My skin now has this reflective quality because itu2019s tighter if that makes any sense?? Also my skin texture has been much better and smoother since using this product. The price is a little bit steep but Iu2019m willing to cut out other products that are more of a fluff because the cheaper products do add up quickly but donu2019t offer even remotely close of a result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this after all the great reviews. It left my skin feeling weirdly dry and tight. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just wanted to try something from this brand. Nice texture. Really mediocre with a luxury price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to give this cream due time to show why itu2019s worth the money but at this point, my initial thought is that itu2019s overpriced. One major complaint- itu2019s smells like feet when I rub it on my face. Not sure if I received a bad lot or what but no one wants stinky feet cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream dried out my skin and made it more sensitive. I wouldnu2019t recommend for skin prone to redness. After using this cream my skin is dry, red and sensitized .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a new lux cream to try. Used to use the la mer gel and a Korean sleeping mask. Saw the before and after with acne. Tried it for myself and I think this and my Sk-II clearing lotion cleared my skin. Now I only get pesky blackheads but no zits! Face feels plump and packaging is clutch. The .5 size lasted me about 6 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am impressed!!!  Skin is so soft, smooth and glowy. I am glad I did not listen to negative reviews and did my own research. I am using AB cleanser gel, the essence and the Cream. I will stick to this routine from now. Amazing results!!! I feel like I wonu2019t need foundation or concealer anymore soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t do anything for me.  My issues are wirnkles, dark spots, textured skin, and dry skin and I saw no improvement. I bought 2 of these to make sure. I donu2019t know what Iu2019m missing.

I've been on the hunt for a Vitamin C serum that a) doesn't smell like oranges or hot fog water, and b) actually works without irritating my rosacea. I've been seeing a SIGNIFICANT difference in my hyperpigmentation so far. Complimentary from Farmacy Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the price. I buy once, cry once - this is a tear jerker! Not worth the price tag in my opinion. Nice cream but so is YSL or any other cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it as a sample and on the first day I noticed an immediate improvement in my skin texture, lines, smoothness. My skin has never looked better. My face was plumped and even toned. I will be buying the big bottle. Iu2019m hooked.

reviews.review_title: Hate the price, love the product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been two weeks since I started using this cream. I bought it because I was getting weird dry red patches around forehead and neck and no cream I had was helping. (I donu2019t know if it was an allergic reaction or using too many products) I was running out of my Skinceuticals triple lipid restore cream, which is supposed to help skin barrier but was doing nothing for my dry patches, so I thought why not try Augustinus Bader? The La Mer cream I have also didnu2019t help at all with the dry patches and just made my skin oilier than it already is. Well, the first day using it my impressions were that it felt nice going on. No irritation. I woke up and thought maybe the redness went down a little but I also thought my skin felt tight. Not what Iu2019ve been used to with the products I use. The second day, redness and dry patches definitely better but still felt a little tight. Fine lines around eyes seem more obvious, not moisturized. Third day, yes redness and dry patches much better. Skin still a little tight but not as bad. Fine lines not as bad as day before. Fourth day, whoa! Everything looks better and clearer. Iu2019m not as oily. Face isnu2019t tight. Fine lines improving. The dry patches better. Redness gone. Overall, just clearer. Fifth day, wow! Everything looks and feels better. Sixth day, still getting better. Seventh day, incredible! Itu2019s like thereu2019s a bit of a smoothing filter on my face. Clear and not oily. Like I have powder on. Skin just feels balanced. Each day after, itu2019s gotten a little better. All I use after cleansing my skin is this cream and spf in morning. I may try adding retinol into routine again after another week or two. My opinion if you are trying this cream, give it at least one week of use and donu2019t use any other products. I think this cream is best for oily or combo skin. If you donu2019t get oily, try the rich cream version. I hate how much it costs but if my skin continues to look as good as it does now I will find a way to keep buying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love The Cream by Augustine Bader. I've stayed loyal to them for a year now, have to say its improved my acne a lot would definitely recommend for someone with sensitive skin. The cool thing about this brand is that 5% of proceeds are donated to charity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, what a scam. This cream isnu2019t remotely moisturizing. And did you see how far down on the ingredients list the ascorbic acid is? Ridiculous. The only thing going for it is that itu2019s unscented. This product exists to separate people from their money and thatu2019s it. Got this in a mini size with my points and regret even doing that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, yes, Iu2019m impressed. I donu2019t say that often. This cream is remarkable. The results are both instantaneous and long term. Iu2019m not a believer in miracle products, I think creams can only do so much. I rarely wear daily moisturizers because I dislike having a coat of cream on my face and I honestly prefer the natural texture of my skin u2014 I have very good skin but still, creams never give the skin a nice texture. You can always see it. I use masks and treatments. Anyway, this cream (provided that you donu2019t expect miracles) is really the best Iu2019ve used (and I have tried everything from Lara Devgan to Fresh to Lancu00f4me to Glossier to Sisley to cheap pharmacy brands to French brands unfindable in the US). It is scentless (yay!), comes in a pump (great!), and it just gives you skin the most seamless u2018improvementu2019 Iu2019ve seen. After a few minutes, you canu2019t see it anymore it just melts away and your skin is smoother. But whatu2019s impressive is that the instant effect actually improves the more you use it. Iu2019m more impressed now than the first time I tried it. Iu2019m in my late 40s, so my skin shows fatigue more easily and is prone the hormonal changes u2014 letu2019s say I have good skin and bad skin days. This cream is a sort of stabilizer. And my skin is sensitive (rosacea) and my eyes prone to styes. This is a very, very good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. Yes itu2019s expensive but worth it. I had redness on my cheeks and this cream made it disappear within a few days. I only use it at night because itu2019s so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample tube of this cream. I am really happy with whatu2019s itu2019s doing for my skin. I apply it on the morning, and hours later my skin still feels moisturized and looks glowy. Itu2019s expensive, but it might be my birthday present to myself. Iu2019m also thinking this one product may be able to replace 2 or 3 other products Iu2019m currently using.

reviews.review_title: Does not hydrate my skin. Huge dissappointment.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The second I apply it on my face, it feels like its sucking the moisture out of it rather than hydrating it, if that makes any sense. I feel a tightness on my face all day, as if I skipped moisturizing completely. I have skin that is slightly on the dry side but certainly never experienced a product like this. I've used La Mer and Tatcha creams for years, but wanted to try AB. Such a disappointment. I wanted to exchange for the RICH version of this cream, but unfortunately I was finishing up my Tatcha and didn't open this until past the 60d exchange period. Customer service wouldn't make an exception, even though I purchase a LOT of high end products and rarely return or exchange anything. Super bummed out because this cream is so pricey and feels terrible on my skin. To add insult to injury, the pump tip fell off when it fell over once, so it just sits loosely on top now. I've only used it 2 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. I'm on my third bottle and am happy to see that Sephora carries this brand now so I can rack up points when I re-stock. have oily skin and it goes on lightly but still hydrates the drier areas and has a very luxe feeling. It seems like it is slowing some of my fine lines and evening out the texture of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it is very pricey but it is an amazing product. I use it AM and PM. 2 pumps are enough for face and neck, you donu2019t want to overdo it. It has completely changed the texture of my skin and my pores shrank. I am prone to breakouts and they have decreased dramatically. Now I only get 2-3 a month and they donu2019t last. Overall, amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this- I have sensitive / combination skin. This is really hydrating and soothing. My skin looks more even toned and supple. I will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Half face test is a true test. Part 1
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have AB products: The cream, The rich cream, Essense and cleanser.  Skin: sensitive, mild acne prone, signs of aging. Tested over one month according to instructions by AB Test approach: left side of the face with AB routine, right side with La Roche-Posay (serums and creams according to LPR routine instructions) Week 2. AB side has worsening breakouts. Otherwise AB seems pleasant and easier to apply than LRP routine. Week 3. AB side needs a pause since acne is getting worse.  Week 3-4  repairing acne on AB side with LRP  Week 5. Continue with initial plan. AB routine on left side, LRP routine on right side. Over the week it becomes clear that AB does not help with preventing nor with clearing of breakouts. The test will have to continue with occasional help of break-out control products.   To be coninued: testing anti-aging impact

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price tag IMO
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A thick, white, opaque cream specially designed for drier skin types. It works well for my combination skin especially my cheeks which tend to be on the drier side  I use it on my cheeks and chin before sunscreen in my AM routine (I use the Versed moisturizer on my forehead and nose)  I honestly donu2019t think itu2019s worth the hefty sum as Iu2019ve tried moisturizers with similar emollients and humectants that produced comparable hydration levels for half the sum   I love moisturizers with Ceramides and this doesnu2019t contain any of them  What I do like about this cream, is itu2019s rich, luxurious, creamy texture. I use Adapalene and Salicylic Acid to help prevent and treat my maskne and hormonal acne and this cream is great at reducing irritation as it is quite hydrating and moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, I love this cream. Yes itu2019s insanely expensive but it drastically changed my skin within a few days of use. My redness and hyperpigmentation improved almost immediately, it is truly magical. HOWEVER I will say I hate the packaging. I usually buy the 30ml size and the cream is not actually in the bottle, itu2019s in a plastic pouch inside the bottle (exactly like the Sunday Riley good genes 15ml) and because of this its stupidly difficult to pump out. It also makes it difficult to use all the product, and with that price tag you want to use every last drop. Towards the end of the bottle I have to pry out the pouch and cut it open to get whatu2019s left. For 225$ youu2019d think it would actually be in the heavy glass bottle. Despite my disdain for the packaging I do love the product. One star off because I wish they would change this!

reviews.review_title: Fantastic product but not sure it's worth the cost
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished my mini bottle of AB The Cream.  I started to see results after 3 weeks in both pore size (and nothing else had ever reduced those) and in reducing an old milia scab on my face.  I would love to use this product but the $85 mini size really should be considered a deluxe sample.  Following the instructions and only using 2 drops on my face and 2 on my neck once a day, the bottle barely lasted a month.  I frankly think it is OBSCENE to charge so much for a cream that does not last a month.  If I used it twice a day as they recommend, I don't think it would have even lasted the 3 weeks you need to see a difference.  They really should consider either lowering the price (Yes, I know it is a luxury product, but the mini SK-II essence lasts several months) or providing more product in the bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a dream!  I use a lot of the AB products. I use them all in AM since you should not use them with any retinol products. My skin was going crazy. I was using expensive vitamin C serums, hyaluronic acid serums and my moisturizer and SPF. My face started breaking out and I have never had acne, not even in my teenage years.  I decided maybe I was using too much product. Less is more. I now use the AB toner, AB The Cream(I did have oily skin, now combo to almost normal) and my SPF. The next day my skin cleared up and the oily skin was becoming normal. These products are worth every penny. If they are not working for you, it may be because you are using other products with it. I stopped using my vitaminC and hyaluronic acid serums in AM and my skin looks and feels incredible. No more breakouts!  I use my other serums when I do a peel and mask once a week at night.

reviews.review_title: No more puffy face- USE WITH OTHER FACE CREAMS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good cream. Basically I have noticed my face isnu2019t swollen anymore and it has helped bring out cheekbones, so it did contour for me. It also brought down my redness in my face. It has helped with wrinkles, they arenu2019t as deep, but they are still there (why I took a star away).   I was told to put this on in the day and at night, BUT you have to put it on then your other face creamsu2026.   I have very sensitive skin and I use murad clarifying cleanser for acne (drys the skin out, has an acid in it), and usually used Chanel le lift.   When I tried just the cream by itself it dried my skin out. When I used it with my Chanel le lift creams it was okay ..still some dry patches here and thereu2026Although with the results Iu2019ve seen I will keep using this, since the dryness is rare, but my face cleanser also is the culprit. Great product when used with other products! You will see the change !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is unfortunately worth its price!!! I just re-ordered 2 bottles so I never have to be without. I was skeptical at first, like most, but did some research on the brand and figured Iu2019d try it out. I will never use another moisturizer. EVER! Hereu2019s the thing: if you want to use additional serums/products you can. However be sure to lay this down FIRST BEFORE anything else. I know thatu2019s sacrosanct to everything we know about layering however the TCF8 component needs to be the first thing on your skin. However with this you donu2019t actually NEED much of anything else. Less is more with this which is why I was drawn to it to begin with Bc I was getting tired of 15 steps every AM & PM. Iu2019ve eliminated all additional serums/creams!! Patience is key with this also. Around week 2/2.5 you will start to see results and between week 4-6 itu2019s just magical. Iu2019ve totally fallen in love with AB and just recently bought the entire line from the cleanser and the essence/toner (on their website) to the new serum and eye cream that was just launched.    TLDR: Itu2019s worth it; it does what it says it will do and more; Less is more. Truly this is really all you need; Patience is key give it time to do itu2019s thing and be consistent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This isnu2019t a bad moisturizer, but for the price it really doesnu2019t do anything life changing. Yes it absorbs quickly, feels nice and works well as either a day or night cream, but honestly you could get the same results from another like even the Kiehlu2019s Ultra Facial Cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample which lasted a full week and I can already see a difference in my skin. Iu2019m significantly less red than normal. Going to have to wait for 20% to buy the whole bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very good cream but expensive!!! My mom got a sample from Allure box she has normal pale white skin. She tried the cream once at night and noticed the difference in the morning. Her cheeks were so firm and soft and gentle like newborn baby butt. I can confirm I felt moms soft face. There were several samples in the box which mom tested out that day. She couldnu2019t confirm 100% which cream made such an effect so she re-tested Augustinus Bader which made the same soft effect.  Mom has gone through chemotherapy recently with really bad skin reaction on her face. Redness and swelling are 1st 2 symptoms within 2 days, then skin inflammation, pinching and aching. She was afraid to try any new product on her face but then again she was never the type which will use only one brand. She always likes to test new products because with age there are new developments and technology which has better effect on skin.   Anyhow, when she applied the cream it is somewhat thick and oily, and when it dries out the skin is sticky. It takes about 1 hour for application to sync in and then happens the magnificent effect of softness which firms the cheeks and removes wrinkles around moth area.   Price wise, YES Expensive, however cream presents real visual effect so on that matter itu2019s well worth the price. We will definitely order in upcoming holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of Augustinus Bader from Influenster and I really love this product. You can feel it working as soon as you put it on. I would recommend to anyone

reviews.review_title: thatu2019s a no for me bruh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not excited at all. My skin is left dry and it actually started breaking out which never happens. Going to try to figure out if I can return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did a full month of using this cream, and followed the directions to put it first after washing. I do not recommend it at all.   I have wrinkles and acne prone skin. I was using Dr Dennis Gross Peel pads and some of his other products and was happy with my skin, but felt the routine was long. This cream was super expensive (a small bottle will last you about 3-4 weeks if you follow their instructions of two pumps morning and night like I did) so I was really hoping it would save me time and bring results.   I quickly noticed it wasnu2019t moisturizing enough, and so I added IT Cosmetics Secret Sauce at night after letting it absorb for about 15 min.   I just came back from a weeks vacation where all I brought was this cream and secret sauce and OMG I couldnu2019t wait to get home to my Dr Dennis Gross! I broke out, my skin looks older, my wrinkles are more pronounced. What a total waste of money, and now I need to get my skin back to where it was. Definitely donu2019t recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this cream with a Sephora order and I love it. The price point is higher than what Iu2019d normally go for however it is a lovely moisturizer. Things I love about it; little to no fragrance, hydrates well without feeling greasy/oily, & itu2019s cruelty free. I have sensitive and maturing skin (39 yrs) that occasionally still gets blemishes. This moisturizer is gentle and leaves my skin feeling smooth. I would recommend and will probably purchase during a sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it hurts your walletu2026 but OMG it does wonders for your face! I have adored this ever since I started using it, and Iu2019ve been BEYOND happy with the results! I usually use the Tatcha Silk Cream as my go-to moisturizer, and now trade off. I will say that using this at night really does seem to have a plumping and smoothing effect that I am LOVING, without feeling heavy or dense on my skin!

reviews.review_title: great addition to daytime skin care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: huge skin care enthusiast, I bought this and it hurt me a bit because of the price. including it in my skin care routine, after a consistent couple of weeks of using, I noticed my acne scarring has reduced, my skin is plump, and has a glow to it. definitely will be purchasing the bigger container. and you don't need more than 2 pumps. a small bottle lasted me approximately 2-3 months, and as someone else said, I wish I could see how much was left in there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING. Perfect for the summer, not at all greasy, and sinks into the skin quickly. Right now I'm using it with the Glow Recipe Plum Plump serum, and I'm really loving the combo. I'm considering buying the Rich version of this cream in the winter. I'm a sucker for a good face moisturizer, and 'The Cream' really does the job.   If you have dry skin, you'll need the Rich cream, because you won't find this one moisturizing enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth it. It sits on top of my skin and it doesnu2019t absorb properly. I have really dry skin.. oily around my nose and chin. Iu2019ve been using Sunday Reilly products and I think they are much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst moisturizer ever. I got this in my allure box and was excited to try it out and now I am wishing I never had. I woke up today with red itchy bumps all over my face. This was the only part of my skincare routine I changed. My normal, non-sensitive skin now looks awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good moisturizer.  I can't say I've noticed it changing my skin in any way though.  If this were reasonably priced I would have given it 5 stars because it is a good moisturizer, but you can get equally good moisturizers from other brands for much less.  For this price I expect noticeably better skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to preface by saying, everyone's skin is different and reacts differently.. I bought the small bottle of the Augustinus Bader The Cream, and decided to just give that a try. I must say, I wake up with AMAZING skin the next morning when I use this. Consistently, that glow is beautiful and it's definitely from this wonderful product. The more you use it, the better your skin looks. I will definitely be a return customer and look forward to trying more products! This cream does not play games, you get what you pay for. I love how this makes my skin look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel and texture of this cream on my skin. My skin feels more plump and hydrated in the morning and I can see a slight difference with fine fines. I did not notice any difference with the redness on my skin. I will continue to use it to see if there are more benefits. I received this product to try from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As usual, I've waited till the last possible minute to write this review. I prefer to wait till the very end of the review window to make sure I am giving each product the opportunity to perform as  promised.   I was also concerned about whether this cream was contributing to acne, as I had a few spots pop up during the time I've used the products. I can now definitively say it was maskne due to TX heat, not the moisturizer. I have not had any irritation with Augustinus Bader's The Cream. It's been a lovely evening moisturizer but I am now switching it to my daytime moisturizer. One of the first things that I noticed was how the texture of The Cream is just perfect. It has a slight slip to it and just feels amazing on the skin. It also absorbs well and doesn't feel tacky.   I have definitely seen a positive difference in the texture of my skin in terms of fine lines, plumpness, and acne scarring from my youth. When I put this on at night, my skin is super soft, supple, and feels calmed.   The results seem to be more pronounced now that I'm using it in conjunction with The Cream Cleansing Gel. They work well in tandem together as a skincare system (symbiotic ingredients I am gathering).   While I will buy just about anything if I see major results, the price is a bit steep to me due to the following: It does not help with my redness/rosacea. The ingredients contain Phenylalanine, which I am not a fan of. Despite these concerns, it's still a magical and powerful restorative moisturizer that I can get behind.   Thankful to Influenster for sending the voxbox my way complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using The Cream for two months, I wish I could say I felt my skin had long term results in the way of evening my texture and noticing a reduction in look of fine lines especially my u201c11u201ds between the brows. I didnu2019t. However, immediately after applying, my skin felt much firmer, softer and lifted. This would last for hours, but I didnu2019t see a progression. A couple of things I noticed about the product. Firstly, itu2019s unscented, which tells me theyu2019re not adding extra ingredients and lets me feel like It may be suitable for someone with sensitive skin. Second, a little goes a long way, so for the price of The Cream, youu2019re getting a big bang for your buck. While using The Cream, I was also using Augustinus Bader The Cream Cleansing Gel. I think I got the best results from The Cream after first using the cleansing gel, which I will also review . All in all, if youu2019re looking for immediate results, this is a great product. I personally didnu2019t have a progression in which I noticed my skin feeling more evenly textured, moisturized and less fine lines. I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review of Augustinus Bader The Cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Spent three weeks using this and assumed it was another totally over hyped product (early 30s, a few light acne scars/discolouration, and some fine lines starting) - went back to read some reviews, and realized I should try skipping other serums before putting it on (ppl mentioned really only using it/putting it directly on skin). Whoa. Huge change, huge difference right away. Just generally much more even tone, looked like Iu2019d just had a facial.   Still not convinced itu2019s worth the full price, but buying as a treat before an even, and during a sale? Yes.  Didnu2019t find heavy all, if anything not quite moisturizing enough in late Canadian winter for oily skin thatu2019s rarely greasy but always dehydrated. Very much a liquid moisturizer, it wonu2019t feel thick if youu2019re used to a heavy cream/something out of a tub. I like to feel dewy, by not weighed down, and this fit the bill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I have tried hundreds of high end moisturizers and something about this one is soo Lux. It feels a little thick at first but it soaks right into the skin and leaves it soo moisturized. I break out very easily and so far I've had no issues at all. I did receive this product through influencer but my thoughts are completely honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is certainly not worth the high price tag. The stars are for the product aside from price. Itu2019s kind of thick going on but doesnu2019t feel greasy or heavy. It left a protective layer but I did not feel that it moisturized long term as well as products that are a fraction of the price and the texture is glue-y. French drugstore brands are far more effective. This also has a PAINT smell which i am surprised not more people have mentioned. Itu2019s celebrity endorsed and somewhat unique feeling I suppose, but itu2019s pretty ho hum to be honest. If youu2019re gonna throw down that kind of cash you could have multiple high quality actives as opposed to a bougie face cream thatu2019s not really amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this cream! The texture is perfect and it's very lightweight. Will definitely purchase when this one is gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

I have combo skin and with that, quite a few areas of my face that are really dry. Since I've been using this, that's gone. My entire face is hydrated and dewy. reviews.review_text: The cream left my thirsty skin looking plump, glowy and hydrated. I did look youthful and lovely for at least a couple of hours after using and felt confident with bare skin. Weu2019re into purchase this again, I would not use it solo as I think a skincare routine needs toners, acids, hyaluronic acid, ceramides, vitamin c, retinoids etc for sustained improvement. I have read of others using this in tandem with different products who were wowed by the results. This would however be a great choice for anyone seeking simplicity in their routine and with a good skincare budget. For those who are broke, donu2019t scrimp and save for this as itu2019s not life changing - you can buy a bunch of cheap actives that would give you similar results. For those who can afford it, itu2019s a great choice for a moisturizer and I would consider repurchasing as my skin has been looking lovely this month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What do you do when you get a Vox box with a cream with celeb-backed hyped and loved by all at all levels with few exceptions? I started fresh with this cream, took a break from my usual skin care regimen for about ten days to test it. In the meantime, I didnu2019t used any product(s) with it other than exfoliating once a week.  The Augustine Bader Rich cream focus areas are fine lines, wrinkles, redness, loss of elasticity and pores. The most important breakthrough ingredient of this cream is TFC8. I looked forward to getting those happy results too and this cream has not disappointed me in that area.  The cream is formulated as a hydrating formula backed by the science with proven results and like I said earlier endorsed by celebs. TFC8 (Trigger factor Complex) is a complex that helps our skin cells to repair and regenerate it naturally. This complex consists of amino acids, vitamins and other synthesized molecules found naturally in our skin cells.  After 11-12 days, I have seen patches of redness around my forehead and dryness around upper cheeks area minimized. And my skin felt refreshed and different aka cleaner glow when your skin cells are repaired from inside out minus any toxic and chemicals in the skin care products. My skin has pores issues and redness issues, if I use anything other than the mild cleanser and mild products. The Rich cream is a soothing change for my skin.  Pros- Creaminess  Packaging and color scheme is attractive Easy to understand directions and Ingredientu2019s list Patented TFC8 technology  Hydrating formula  Amazing list of ingredients from Argan, avocado oil to Squalene which helps with the skin elasticity.   They donate 5% of your order value to the select charities.  The product is 100% vegan and free from gluten, parabens, heavy metals and fragrances.  Cons-  Price range of $170 for 30ml can be high for few. Now a good question- Am I going to switch to this product from my usual holy grail products? I might switch to this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with his face moisturizer. I have combination oily skin, so itu2019s been really hard trying to find a moisturizer that works for my skin. I love this moisturizer because itu2019s lightweight, refreshing to the skin and is a deep hydrator. It also supports cellular Renewal and reduces the signs of aging. I will definitely recommend this moisturizer if youu2019re looking for one. I promise you wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_title: Great Cream But Price Tag Hefty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really put this creme to the test because I wanted to justify the price tag. I have Dry / Combo sensitive skin with early signs of fine lines, hyper pigmentation, and dark spots. You can see before and after photos below, images were taken 4 weeks apart.   Quality / Ingredients The quality of the cream cleansing gel is great all the ingredients are top notch and clean. You also have the secret key  (ingredient) technology from Dr Bader which is the TFC8 which took years of research to develop.   Packaging Feels very high end and is gorgeous, I work in product development so I know how much time the little details on the tops, quality of the glass etc can take and I truly appreciate it. Also the boxes that the bottles come in are made fully recyclable FSC-Certified paper.   Appliation The creme goes on so smooth and is super gentle on the skin. My skin tends to react to skincare fairly quickly and it was gentle enough for my skin to adapt immediately.   Since I tend to be dry (especially on my mouth, nose and chin area I did have to add another more moisturizing cream on top, especially at night.    You can see in the images below that it did even out my skin tone, especially on my cheeks. It also helped with my dark circle pigmentation. I did also want to point out that it did not break me out and did not add any other blemishes besides my annoyingly persistent 2 hormonal pimples on my right chin area.   Overall I loved being able to see results with the before and after and as much as I want to justify the high price tag of the creme I just canu2019t. Yes, my skin loved it but I canu2019t imagine spending 170-265$ every 2-3 months. I do think there are other products out there that probably can give you similar results and that is why Iu2019m giving it 4 out of 5 stars just because of the price tag. I would hope that Dr Bader would come out with a sub-brand with a more affordable price tag for those of us that canu2019t always afford high ticket items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is one of the best Iu2019ve tried. The moisture lasts all day with this. It has an almost tightening effect once applied but itu2019s one that is not drying. Thereu2019s some anti-aging magic in here. Iu2019m 30 and I have one deep-set wrinkle starting on my forehead that appears noticeably smoother since Iu2019ve started using this. I recommend using it after washing your face with the Augustinus Bader The Cream Cleansing Gel. If youu2019re middle-aged and worried about signs of aging this is a great buy. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know how these great products keep falling into my lap. I received this product complimentary for testing and review purposes. When I test skin care products, I like to start applying it alone without my usual skincare products just so I can get a realistic idea of what the product is capable of doing to my combination dry skin.   My skin looks and feels smooth after using the cream. It did hydrated my skin instantly! However, it didnu2019t hydrate my skin all day. My skin started to get dry so I added a tiny pump of my VaniCream for an extra hydration boost and worked like a charm. After 2 weeks, I started adding it to my skincare routine. Itu2019s very friendly when using it with other products.   For nighttime routine, I do a pump of Augustinus Bader cream and a pump of my Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Night Moisturizer (Retinol).   After using doing this for a whole month along with the Augustinus Bader Gel Cleanser, my skin has appeared brighter, even, toned and regenerated and itu2019s texture has looked smoother and firm.

I used this product in a skin care routine that includes the Augustinus Bader The Cream Cleansing Gel. After four weeks, my skin looks brighter and less dull, but my fine lines look the same.  The overall results are subtle and I had higher expectations for this luxury product than what I saw and felt.  I have fair, combination type, non-sensitive skin. Iu2019m sorry to say that I personally donu2019t feel this product is a good value for me at $170 for 30 mL as my results were subtle.

reviews.review_title: Product has some positives, more negatives
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product from influenster for free in return for my honest review* I wish I could give 1/2 stars, I would give 2 and a half. There are some good things about this moisturizer:  I noticed some lessening of fine lines,  a softing and plumping of my skin and some mild brightening. It is not scented or dyed, which is nice and my preference. A little goes a long way and the smaller bottle will last awhile. The bottle it self is very simple and nice looking. reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this product.... a review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always searching for everyday luxury, and The Cream by Augustinus Bader feels like luxury in a bottle.   While the price point outpaces some of my favorite brands (Tatcha, Dr. Perricone, etc) the price is well below other luxury brands such as La Mer, while retaining many of the same qualities. As an RN who works in the hospital in a facemask for over 12 hours a day, skincare is everything to me right now. I received Augustinus Baderu2019s The Cream and The Gel Cleanser and used them religiously for a month in order to truly assess the impact of these products on my skin. I incorporated the cleanser for the first week and then added The Cream. I would say that the combination of these products has transformed my skin in a way that I have not seen with any other skincare items.   My previous regimen was exclusively Tatchau2019s Dewy line, but I consider Augustinus Bader products to be now an integral part of that ritual. The Gel Cleanser reminds me of Cetaphil (if you know, you know), and I will leave details about that product on its product page, but The Cream is the u201cgame changeru201d in my view. Three to four pumps easily covers my face, jaw, and neck. After a month the results that I have seen are similar to that of a (subtle) dermal filler (think Sculptra, not Botox). The Cream has made noticeable impacts to the structural integrity of my skin, removing the fine lines and crows feet from around my eyes, smoothing the marionette lines that have been worsening wearing such a tight mask for so long, and giving my skin a plump and smooth appearance that looks like the u201cglass skinu201d I have always wanted. I thought it was impossible, but I have the better skin now than I did when I was in my early twenties. My skin looks plump, poreless, and lit from within. It is amazing to me to have found a product that meets all my skincare needs in one, but somehow Augustinus Bader has done just that. It is worth every penny..... in fact next time Iu2019ll buy my own.

Sure, at $180 USD/ oz, the price tag is steep but you only have to buy one product rather than separate serum, eye cream and moisturizer, so in actuality you are likely saving money. I am age 49, combination skin, living in an urban, sunny hot/humid climate (aka my skin can get stressed and reactive). Due to some health issues recently, my skin is also quite dehydrated and prone to rashes. I was a little nervous to try a new product but so glad I did! In just 14 days of use, there was a noticeable improvement in the overall quality of my facial/neck/decolletage skin. The lotion has no detectable fragrance and is very lightweight and effective. Iu2019ve noticed my sun spots are fading, pores appear smaller and overall my skin is less congested, less reactive and there is a notable reduction in redness. It is truly my new holy grail moisturizer. I did receive this product free of charge from Influenster in exchange for my honest review, but will definitely purchase again and again because it is such an effective product.

reviews.review_text: I received this free to review and give my honest feedback. I wasn't sure what expect with the product. I did some research and honestly wasn't overly impressed with the ingredients and their placement on the list. Now you are looking at my stars and scratching your head. Don't worry me too! I have oily combo skin and I love skin care. Because I'm reviewing I stopped using my normal skin care to see how my skin changed over the month I have had it and that was the big surprise! The moisturizer is light in consistency and thin. Reminds me of the drunk elephant protini and has a similar scent that is quick to dissipate. The packaging looks heavy but is light in hand. However, it is very beautiful and looks lux. Okay cons, the product takes a while to sink in. It doesn't sit on the skin but it also feels for a while that it isn't doing anything. After using the face wash from this line but akin can feel right and this doesn't instantly relieve it. I would be thoughtful about what kind of face wash you use. If it strips your face or extra dry while I believe it will work it's going to take a second. Honestly after my first wash and using this I had no plans of returning. Pros: This is great under makeup, and on my oily face it seems to help me not be overly oily. Also the biggest surprise my skin looks great. So great that I haven't felt like putting on concealer or light make up during the work day. Yeah that's how nice it is my face is brighter and while I have my trouble areas they seem to be better. I would think with more use and finally putting other products back into the routine it is going to be a keeper especially in these warm months. If you are looking to invest and the cons don't bother you too much this is a winner. Added a photo of me after 8 hours of wear and only mascara, eyeliner, and a little eyeshadow on. Also no filter!

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary of Influenster along with the The Cream Cleansing Gel. I am already seeing a change in the overall appearance of my skin. Highly recommend especially paired with The Cream Cleansing Gel.
